This markdown document will create a plot showing MLB runscoring trends since the 1901 season, updating the blog posts:

* [Major League Baseball run scoring trends with R's Lahman package](http://bayesball.blogspot.ca/2013/06/major-league-baseball-run-scoring.html)

* [Run scoring trends: using Shiny to create dynamic charts and tables in R](http://bayesball.blogspot.ca/2015/01/run-scoring-trends-using-shiny-to.html)

* [github.com/MonkmanMH/MLBrunscoring_shiny](https://github.com/MonkmanMH/MLBrunscoring_shiny)


```{r packages}

library(Lahman)
library(tidyverse)

```
